nodes.text: The Redspace Reefs was a location where the Pursuer, an Imperial I-class Star Destroyer which served as the headquarters and carrier of the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing, earned its name from the vessel's involved in a chase. Around 5 ABY, members of the 204th, including the field-promoted commanding officer Colonel Soran Keize, told stories over a fire while on the planet Troithe, the chase through the Redspace Reefs being among the tales.
The Redspace Reefs was mentioned in the 2020 novel Shadow Fall, the second instalment of the Star Wars: Alphabet Squadron trilogy written by Alexander Freed.
